welcome_message_body: Welcome to Madrid, a vibrant city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy exploring all that this charming city has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your visit.

restaurants.name: Daboy's Bakeshop

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
